CustomField.formula: TEXT(IF( ISBLANK(Num_of_Bundles_for_Settlement__c) , Suggested_Bundles_for_Settlement__c , Num_of_Bundles_for_Settlement__c)) & " " & IF( ISBLANK( Replacement_Product__c ) , TEXT(Product__r.Unit_of_Measure__c) & " " & Product__r.Name , TEXT( Replacement_Product__r.Unit_of_Measure__c) & " " & Replacement_Product__r.Name )
CustomField.label: Conga Replacement Product
